The photo was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been shared over 700 times.
The packets of curry and chilli powder d: a state-owned retailer, have a flower symbol printed on them, which is circled in red in the photo.
The Sinhala: language caption of the post translates to English as "Condemn with disgust, the use of curry powder and chili powder packets given to helpless people at this time for politics."
The chairperson of Dil Foods: the manufacturer listed on the packets of spice, refuted the claim that its logo has any political connection and stated that the packaging was printed more than six months ago, long before the COVID-19 outbreak and the nationwide lockdown.
